faqs.question: Who is Purva by Puravankara?
faqs.answer: Purva is the premium residential brand of , one of India’s most established real estate developers known for quality construction, thoughtful design, and timely delivery.

faqs.question: How long has Puravankara been in the real estate industry?
faqs.answer: Puravankara has over 45 years of experience in real estate and has developed residential and commercial projects across major Indian cities.

faqs.question: Are Purva projects RERA approved?
faqs.answer: Yes. All ongoing Purva projects are registered under RERA, ensuring transparency, regulatory compliance, and buyer protection.

faqs.question: What is Purva known for?
faqs.answer: Purva is known for premium design-led homes, superior construction quality, well-planned communities, prime locations, and a strong legacy of trust.

faqs.question: What construction technology does Purva use?
faqs.answer: Purva uses advanced RCC construction along with modern formwork systems and high-quality materials, supported by stringent quality checks and in-house project management.

faqs.question: Does Puravankara deliver projects on time?
faqs.answer: Puravankara has a strong track record of on-time and near-on-time delivery across multiple cities, supported by robust project planning and execution systems.

faqs.question: Are Purva property prices negotiable?
faqs.answer: Prices are generally standardized, but buyers may benefit from limited-period launch offers, festive schemes, or payment plan benefits. Your sales advisor or PropYouLike can share current offers.

faqs.question: What is the typical booking amount for a Purva home?
faqs.answer: Booking amounts vary by project and unit type, usually ranging from ₹50,000 to a few lakhs. Exact details are confirmed at the time of booking.

faqs.question: What payment plans are available for Purva projects?
faqs.answer: Depending on the project stage, Purva offers construction-linked plans, down-payment plans, bank loan–linked plans, and select subvention schemes during special launches.

faqs.question: What documents are required to book a Purva property?
faqs.answer: Common documents include PAN card, Aadhaar, passport-size photographs, income proof, and bank statements. NRIs may need passport, OCI/PIO, and overseas address proof.

faqs.question: How is maintenance handled after possession?
faqs.answer: Maintenance is typically managed by a professional facility management team, and later transitioned to the residents’ association as per standard practice.

faqs.question: Is renting out a Purva home easy?
faqs.answer: Yes. Purva projects usually see strong rental demand due to premium specifications, brand value, and well-connected locations.

faqs.question: Is the booking amount refundable?
faqs.answer: Cancellation and refund policies vary by project. Some deductions may apply as per the agreement. Buyers are advised to review terms before booking.

faqs.question: Can I make changes to the unit layout?
faqs.answer: Structural changes are not permitted. Minor interior modifications may be carried out after possession, subject to society guidelines.

faqs.question: What warranty does Purva provide on homes?
faqs.answer: Purva provides defect liability coverage as per RERA norms and long-term structural warranties, offering peace of mind to buyers.

faqs.question: Are Purva projects suitable for end users or investors?
faqs.answer: Both. End users benefit from premium living, thoughtful layouts, and amenities, while investors gain from strong brand recall, rental demand, and long-term appreciation.
